report1: Your dictionary is still quite empty.. *Add a few words* to start learning and track your progress 📚 Every new word brings you closer to mastering the language!
report2: It's time to study ‚è∞ Click the button below to start your session üëá

report4: Our estimates suggest you have mastered *{{percentage}}%* of the words you've recently added to your dictionary. Click the button below to continue learning üëá
report5: At the moment, we estimate that you've mastered *{{percentage}}%* of the words you've recently added to your dictionary. You already know *{{wellKnownWords}}* words well! Maybe it's time to add something new? ü§î

wordsSuggestion: Do you already know these words?
wordSuggestionDesc: Hit card to add word to your vocabulary.
howWell: How well do you know this word?
perfect: Amazing! You mastered all {{grade3Count}} words perfectly. You should be proud! Is learning becoming second nature to you?
goodProgress: Congratulations! You know {{grade3Count}} words perfectly. Great job! There are still {{grade1Count}} words that need attention, but you're on the right track!
balancedEffort: Great effort! You‚Äôve mastered {{grade3Count}} words perfectly. {{grade2Count}} need a bit more practice, and {{grade1Count}} need your attention. A productive session!
needsImprovement: Don't give up! In this session, {{grade1Count}} words were challenging, but that means there‚Äôs plenty to learn. Remember, repetition is the key to success!
steadyImprovement: Your practice paid off! {{grade2Count}} words are at a decent level, but there‚Äôs still room for improvement. You also mastered {{grade3Count}} words perfectly!
bothInputs: You have to fill both inputs.
soFar: So far, you have added *{{wordsCount}}* words to your vocabulary.
brag: We don't want to brag, but we've added a little extra to that, as *{{langoWords}}* of them come from *Lango*!
nextTime: Next time, you definitely have to try adding some flashcards from Lango!
removingFlashcardDesc: Are you sure you want to remove this flashcard?
finishingSessionDesc: Are you sure you want to leave the session? We will save your progress.
choose_language_desc: You can pick the language you're interested in.
settings_long_desc: Customize the appearance, behavior, and preferences of the app so that it perfectly matches your workflow.
words_desc: Take a look on your {{words_number}} words
loading_content_desc: Be patient! It will take a while to load your data.
welcome_desc: ... an app that will help you finally master new words and make sure you remember the ones you learned in the past
no_items_desc: Try adding some words to your vocabulary.
start_search_desc: Try to type something above to search for a flashcard.
select_level: Tap the appropriate tile with the grade.
turn_on_notifications_desc: Enable notifications so we can remind you about study sessions, motivate your progress, and support you in building a consistent language-learning routine.
notifications_disabled_message: To enable notifications, you need to change the app settings in your system.
